name: pokowaka-iwyu
description: A tool for use with clang to analyze #includes in C and C++ source files

iwyu.exe.description: Path to the include what you use executable.

iwyu.mapping_file.description: Mapping file to use if any.

iwyu.transitive_includes_only.description: Do not suggest that a file add foo.h unless foo.h is already visible in the file's transitive includes.

iwyu.max_line_length.description: Maximum line length for includes.Note that this only affects comments and alignment thereof, the maximum line length can still be exceeded with long file names

iwyu.no_default_mappings.description: do not add iwyu's default mappings.

iwyu.keep.description: A glob that tells iwyu to always keep these includes. Can be provided multiple times.

iwyu.additional_params.description: Additional parameters you wish to pass to iwyu.

iwyu.safe.description: Do not remove unused #includes/fwd-declares from header files; just add new ones.

iwyu.reorder.description: Re-order lines relative to other similar lines (e.g. headers relative to other headers).

iwyu.ignore_re.description: Skip editing any file whose name matches this regular expression.

iwyu.only_re.description: Skip editing any file whose name does NOT match this regular expression.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && npm run copy:py
